channel.title: Trying to host SMP localhost server
channel.description: How do I make it cracked? My brother wants to play, and he has a cracked client, and I'm hosting it on 127.0.0.1. Also, will I need to portforward? I have a lot of other questions, but I forgot them. I'll ask them when I remember.

item.title: Trying to host SMP localhost server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:9, topic:388505”]HURR LOL
That was MC classic stuff.

I can connect, but my brother can’t.

#Minecraft server properties
#Mon Mar 28 19:30:17 CDT 2011
level-name=world
hellworld=false
spawn-monsters=true
online-mode=false
spawn-animals=true
max-players=2
server-ip=127.0.0.1
pvp=true
server-port=25565
white-list=false[/quote]

If they’re on the same network, they have to use the 192.168.X.X if I recall. If on a different network, No-IP, etc

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to host SMP localhost server

server-ip=127.0.0.1
should be blank from what I remember

max-players=2
try changing that to 3?

item.title: Trying to host SMP localhost server
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

#Minecraft server properties
#Mon Mar 28 18:29:10 CDT 2011
verify-names=true
admin-slot=false
port=25565
public=true
server-name=Minecraft Server
max-players=3
max-connections=16
motd=My server.
grow-trees=false

Hopefully that’s the SMP shit.

Read full topic
